snippet.title: Galactic Thunderdome - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist us on steam and join the playtest! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1219800/Galactic_Thunderdome/

Announcing Pansimula's first standalone title: Galactic Thunderdome (GTD).
Galactic Thunderdome is a couch co-op 2D physics based platform brawler, where the physics engine is part of the combat strategy. Instead of trigger animations, you swing physical objects to bash your opponent into walls, hazards and collapsible walls.

At the moment there are 10 characters, each with a unique ability, and 70+ weapons.
We have several game modes, such as Deathmatch, Capture the flag, Team Deathmatch, Treasure Hunt, King of Hill, Soccer, Tug of War and more. Our goal is to soon finish up our multiplayer arena gameplay, and then start working on some co-op/singleplayer experiences like adventure modes, survival, boss battles, etc.

Follow us on social media for more updates and chances to have your ideas added to the game! 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/pansimula
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/GalacticThunderdome/
Discord: https://discord.gg/arnsSqpxAJ
